image.name: inputImageFile
image.label: Input Image
image.description: Input image in which to count and classify positive pixels

float.name: mag
float.label: Thumbnail Magnification
float.description: Magnification of thumbnail image to use.

file.name: outputAnnotationFile
file.label: Image Annotation
file.description: Annotation to relate the image to the source (*.anot)

string.name: frame
string.label: Frame Index
string.description: Frame index in a multi-frame image

string.name: style
string.label: Style Options
string.description: Image style options for compositing a multi-frame image

string.name: scheduler
string.label: Scheduler Address
string.description: Address of a dask scheduler in the format '127.0.0.1:8786'. Not passing this parameter sets up a dask cluster on the local machine. 'multiprocessing' uses Python multiprocessing. 'multithreading' uses Python multiprocessing in threaded mode.

integer.name: num_workers
integer.label: Number of workers
integer.description: Number of dask workers to start while setting up a local cluster internally. If a negative value is specified then the number of workers is set to number of cpu cores on the machine minus the number of workers specified.

integer.name: num_threads_per_worker
integer.label: Number of threads per worker
integer.description: Number of threads to use per worker while setting up a local cluster internally. Must be a positive integer >= 1.
